comments:
TM (5/16/2001 16:04:32)
	SDK 107.

	I did a <ctrl-o> while editing a java file. I got an error dialog + this exception in the log:

1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Log: Wed May 16 16:03:31 GMT+02:00 2001
4 org.eclipse.ui 0 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
